summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Community Development Block Grant Float Loan Program; authorizing a short-term loan of up to Two Million Nine Hundred Thousand Dollars ($2,900,000) in federal Block Grant funds to Rose & Associates, L.L.C. to finance the costs of leasehold improvements, inventory and equipment for the Union Street Red Apple Market; appropriating funds for the loan and for possible new advances after early repayments; authorizing related agreements and amendment of the Consolidated Plan and Action Plan to reflect such loan; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
